body: A number of times per day equal to his Charisma modifier, a songhealer can cause any healing effect from a spell completion or spell trigger item to function at a caster level equal to his class level. This ability replaces versatile performance.
name: Enhance Healing
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Bard/Bard Archetypes/Songhealer/Enhance Healing
